Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylisthuge

Class ArrayListHugeAbstract

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.containers.arraylisthuge.ArrayListHugeAbstract
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayListHuge, ArrayListHugeDouble, ArrayListHugeFloat, ArrayListHugeInt, ArrayListHugeLong
public abstract class ArrayListHugeAbstract extends Object
Base class used by all intrinsic ArrayListHugeXXX objects.

  • Field Details

    • segArraySize

      protected static final int segArraySize
      The size of each segment stored in the parent ArrayListHuge container. This is big enough so that 64bit object references, longs, and doubles can all be safely allocated within the JAVA limitation Integer.MAX_VALUE bytes.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • aldASize

      protected long aldASize
      The total number of entries stored in the parent ArrayListHuge container.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArrayListHugeAbstract

      public ArrayListHugeAbstract()

  • Method Details

    • getSegmentCount

      public abstract int getSegmentCount()
      Abstract function that returns the number of array segments allocated by the parent ArrayListHuge object.
      Returns:
      The number of allocated array segments.

    • intrinsicSize

      public abstract int intrinsicSize()
      Abstract function defined by a sub classes that gives the intrinsic byte size of a single entry.
      Returns:
      The intrinsic byte size of a single entry in the list.

    • getSegmentArraySize

      public int getSegmentArraySize()
      Returns the segment array size (i.e. the number of entries allocated for each segment created by the list).
      Returns:
      The segment array size (i.e. the number of entries allocated for each segment created by the list).

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if no entries are stored in this ArrayListHuge object.
      Returns:
      true if no entries are stored in this ArrayListHuge object.

    • size

      public long size()
      Returns the number of entries stored in this ArrayListHuge object.
      Returns:
      The number of entries stored in this ArrayListHuge object.

    • resetSize

      protected void resetSize()
      Resets the list size to zero. Note: The list capacity is not changed by this method ... only the list size (aldASize = 0).

    • resetSize

      public void resetSize​(long size)
      Resets the lists size to the index prescribed by the input size. Note: The list capacity is not changed by this method ... only the list size (aldASize) if the input size is smaller than the current size.
      Parameters:
      size - The new list size.

    • resetSize

      public void resetSize​(int si, int ei)
      Resets the lists size to the index prescribed by the input segment (si) and element (ei) indices. Note: The list capacity is not changed by this method ... only the list size (aldASize) if the input size is smaller than the current size.
      Parameters:
      si - The segment index.
      ei - The element index.

    • memoryEstimate

      public long memoryEstimate()
      The total memory size (in bytes) allocated to this object. Does not include the additional memory allocated by Java to represent Array objects and a single array list.
      Returns:
      The total memory size.

    • getIndex

      protected long getIndex​(int si, int ei)
      Returns the primary index given the input segment (si) and element indices.
      Parameters:
      si - The segment index.
      ei - The element index.
      Returns:
      The primary index.

    • getSegmentIndex

      public int getSegmentIndex​(long index)
      Returns the segment index given the index position of an element.
      Parameters:
      index - The index position of an element in the huge list.
      Returns:
      The segment index given the index position of an element.

    • getElementIndex

      public int getElementIndex​(long index)
      Returns a segments elementIndex given the index position of an element.
      Parameters:
      index - The index position of an element in the huge list.
      Returns:
      A segments elementIndex given the index position of an element.

    • capacity

      public long capacity()
      Returns the total element capacity of this list. The capacity is always an increment of the total array segment entry size (getSegmentArraySize()).
      Returns:
      The total element capacity of this list.

    • validateIndex

      public void validateIndex​(int si, int ei, int n)
      Throws an error if the input segment index (si), element index (ei), and increment (n) exceed the current list size (aldASize), or if si or ei are negative.
      Parameters:
      si - Segment Index.
      ei - Element Index.
      n - Increment.

    • read

      public void read​(String filename) throws IOException
      Fills this array list with the contents of the input file (filename).
      Parameters:
      filename - The input file that will be loaded into this array list.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • read

      public abstract void read​(FileInputBuffer fib) throws IOException
      Reads data from the input file buffer and fills this ArrayList with the contents.
      Parameters:
      fib - The FileInputBuffer from which this array list is filled.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • write

      public void write​(String filename) throws IOException
      Writes this huge array list to the input file (filename).
      Parameters:
      filename - The output file where this array list will be written.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • write

      public abstract void write​(FileOutputBuffer fob) throws IOException
      Writes this array list to the input file output buffer.
      Parameters:
      fob - The output file buffer containing the location where this array list will be written.
      Throws:
      IOException
